meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>miscellaneous</kanji> <kanji>cloth</kanji> is a <vocabulary>dust cloth</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>house cloth</vocabulary>. It's just a cloth that you use on random things.
readingMnemonic: The reading of 雑 is different from what you've learned. Instead of ざつ it's ぞう. Just imagine using this <vocabulary>dust cloth</vocabulary> to wipe down a <reading>象</reading> (ぞう). Its trunk is particularly dusty.
